title: Ep 149: Self-Care vs. Self-Deprecation with Cazzie David
itunes:title: Ep 149: Self-Care vs. Self-Deprecation with Cazzie David
itunes:subtitle: Kate receives her mysterious package and Doree is bummed her tennis lessons are canceled. Then, Cazzie David joins them to discuss her new book No One Asked For This.
description:
Kate receives her mysterious package and Doree is bummed her tennis lessons are canceled. Then, Cazzie David joins them to discuss her new book No One Asked For This, how she balances creativity and growing up with famous parents, and what it’s like to handle personal feelings in a public arena. Plus, Cazzie and Kate try to convince Doree that mint is a delicious flavor. 


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.

Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums).
